item.title: Tree in need of being cut back, 18th September
item.description:
TfL has confirmed now this is a Bromley Council tree, not theirs. Residents have complained that it needs to be cut back. Can this be inspected asap? Https://streetcare.tfl.gov.uk/report/8141477

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kentish Way, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 54, Lennard Rd, Penge - The OHV I reported on 19th May has still not been cut back to the property edge. Seen 17/9/25., 18th September
item.description:
54, Lennard Rd, Penge - The OHV I reported on 19th May has still not been cut back to the property edge. Seen 17/9/25. This is a narrow footpath with, I believe, permissive two wheel parking leaves only about 1.25m width to walk on, but this is obstructed by residential OHV.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 66, Lennard Road, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet
